Author: LisichkaYenotik
Text: My go to method:  - let yourself be upset. Like... honestly. You're allowed to be vulnerable.   - if you feel like things have been left unsaid, write a huge letter, spell check it and make it PERFECT and then burn it.  - take your hobby and go crazy for it. I like reading. I am going to read 52 books this year.   - self care. Your own way. Personally i take a load of baths and turn off my phone. Makes me feel amazing.

Author: NewBullMoose
Text: Don't get involved with people in the first place.  JK sorry that's just what I do, hope you feel better.
